summary: Reduced agent system startup context from ~1,874 to 549 lines (71% reduction). Created 5 reference context files for lazy loading, slimmed CLAUDE.md from 227 to 77 lines, trimmed rules files from 1,647 to 472 lines, and added path scoping to all rules.

completion_data.completion_summary: Reduced startup context from ~25,000 to ~6,000 tokens by extracting reference content to lazy-loaded files, slimming CLAUDE.md (66% reduction), trimming all 7 rules files (71% reduction), and adding path scoping.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Restructured CLAUDE.md to 77 lines, trimmed 7 rules files totaling 472 lines, created 5 reference files in .claude/context/core/reference/, updated index.md with new reference section

next_steps: Test new session to verify reduced context usage. Consider further optimizations to rules/latex.md if needed.
